Item Quirks: Busted. The item is in Broken condition.
Damaged. Roll on the Condition chart.
Shoddy. The first time this item loses a level of condition, it becomes Destroyed.
Enigmatic. The item is strangely-shaped and must be puzzled out.
Tough. Weapons are damaged only on a 1, armor only on a 20, and gear only on a natural 2.
Indestructible. The item becomes TL5 and impervious to all but intentional damage.
